response.original_title: A la media noche y media
response.overview: A huge wave threatens to destroy the city. Its inhabitants flee in fear: few remain on the streets. A skeptical and indecisive young man, a woman who seeks in others the passion she does not have and an apocalyptic girl remain in the city, and turn it into a game board, where they bet love and the end of the world.
response.title: A la media noche y media
